LanguageData.BuildPumpShotgun.label: Build Remington 870
LanguageData.BuildPumpShotgun.description: Builds an ancient shotgun for personal defence.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildM37A2_USCM.label: Build M37A2 Pump Shotgun
LanguageData.BuildM37A2_USCM.description: The M37A2 Pump Shotgun which also known as the M37A2 Combat Shotgun, is a pump-action combat shotgun.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildStrikerShotgun.label: Build Striker Shotgun
LanguageData.BuildStrikerShotgun.description: Builds a Striker Shotgun, a cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun. Has a high fire rate and high damage output, but low range.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildTacticalShotgun.label: Build M45 Tactical Shotgun
LanguageData.BuildTacticalShotgun.description: Builds the M45 Tactical Shotgun, a shotgun used by the United Nations Space Command Army. Holds 8 shells with a quick fire rate but low range.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildAA12AutoShotgun.label: Build Atchisson Assault AA-12
LanguageData.BuildAA12AutoShotgun.description: Builds an Atchisson Assault AA-12, an automatic shotgun with almost no recoil. Has burst fire, is moderately accurate at just under rifle range and has high damage output.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildTacticalAutoshotgun.label: Build M90 CAWS
LanguageData.BuildTacticalAutoshotgun.description: Builds the M90 Close Assault Weapon System (M90 CAWS). It is the UNSC's primary shotgun and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces.\nCaliber: 12 Gauge
